alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 7:53PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Citrus and northwestern Hernando Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 753 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Inverness Highlands South, or near Inverness, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Inverness, Homosassa Springs, Beverly Hills, Inverness Airport, Crystal River Airport, Black Diamond, Homosassa, Inverness Highlands South, Inverness Highlands North, Hernando, Sugarmill Woods, Arbor Lakes, Lecanto, Leisure Acres, Inverness Highlands, Pine Ridge, Heatherwood, Citrus Hills, Gospel Island and Floral City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
